Cryptol.Compiler.Rust.Crate

Description

Utilities for generating crates and including the generated runtime libraries

Synopsis

mkCrate #

Arguments

:: Bool

Do we want an example driver

-> String

Name of the crate

-> FilePath

Directory to store the crate in

-> [Ident]

Crate `lib.rs` with these modules, if non-empty

-> IO () 

Make a barebones crate with the given name and the given directory.
